description: The Maschine 2 is a standalone DAW but is designed to be used with the Maschine controller, which is similar to a drum machine. The MXPRJ file is created by Maschine 2 when a user chooses to save their project. The parameters in the project are meant to be modified, allowing a user to save a project, close the Maschine 2 program, reopen it, load the project, and continue production on their audio project.
